text:
Am I missing something obvious here or is it a subtyping bug?

```julia> Type === (Type{T} where T)
true

julia> Type <: supertype(Union)
true

julia> (Type{T} where T) <: supertype(Union)
false```

elements.text: Am I missing something obvious here or is it a subtyping bug?

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

Success, it has been cross posted <https://discourse.julialang.org/t/55512| to Discourse>. Keep and eye out on Discourse for responses and please add an answer there once you are satisfied with the solution so others can benefit as well. Happy debugging!
Hey <@UNF9QDRNJ>, if you were able to find an answer here on Slack, please cross post it to Discourse via the link above. Thank you!
That does look like a bug. Can you make an issue on the Julia github?
